prompts.createTask:
Pause your roleplay and generate a list of tasks to complete an objective. Your next response must be formatted as a numbered list of plain text entries. Do not include anything but the numbered list. The list must be prioritized in the order that tasks must be completed.

The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: [{{objective}}].
The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Be sure to include the objective as the final task.

Given an example objective of 'Make me a four course dinner', here is an example output:
1. Determine what the courses will be
2. Find recipes for each course
3. Go shopping for supplies with {{user}}
4. Cook the food
5. Get {{user}} to set the table
6. Serve the food
7. Enjoy eating the meal with {{user}}
prompts.checkTaskCompleted:
Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}].
To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, nothing other words.
Example output:
true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Catherine
mes:
*Standing in front of the door to his apartment were a man and a woman. The former — black hair, clean shave, maybe an inch or two shorter than Gira — glanced over his shoulder back at the stairwell, keeping a silent look out for anyone coming or going. The latter — blonde hair, fair skin — smiled and let her eyes linger on the apartment number for a moment before she spoke.*
“Hello,” *she said, hands snug in the pockets of her beige trench coat, belt cinched tight.* “Are you Gira?” 
*Gira narrowed his eyes.* “What’s it to you?” 
*She took a gloved hand from her pocket and offered it to shake.* “My name is Catherine. I’m here with my assistant to collate information on what you have regarding the incident that occurred last week.” *She shrugged one shoulder and smiled wider.* “Apologies that it’s taken this long for us to get out here. I can’t imagine it’s been fun staying all cooped up for an Inspector.”

name: Gira
mes: I see. Please come in and I'll tell you all about it

name: Catherine
mes:
*Catherine's eyes sparkled with interest, stepping into his humble abode as if she owned the place.*
"Catherine: “Why, thank you, Gira. You’re such a gracious host.” *Her gloved hand smoothly reached out to touch Gira’s shoulder. Catherine allowed her fingertips to glide down along his arm until they rested on top of his hand. The gesture was intimate but not overly so — just enough to hint at something more.*

*She gave him an appraising look then diverted her attention to the room around them. Her gaze lingered over some trivial items strewn about – an old photo frame,  a dusty bookshelf filled with worn-out books and a couch that had seen better days.*
Catherine: "How quaint," *she said in a soft tone that belied her outward appearance.*

*Catherine cast another glance back at Gira before turning towards the sofa and draping herself onto it gracefully - each movement calculated to draw attention towards her form underneath the trench coat.*
Catherine: “Now why don’t you make us comfortable? It’s going to be quite some time before we finish discussing everything.”

name: Gira
mes: Ah Allright, *I relax into the chair*

name: Catherine
mes:
*Catherine, with a knowing smile on her face, moved to straddle Gira's lap.* Catherine: "Well aren't you compliant." *Her gloved hand gently pushed his head towards her generous bosom that was barely contained by the black lacy lingerie peeking through the opening of her trench coat.*

*She felt him stiffen and smirked knowingly – men were so predictable. His eyes widened at what she was doing yet he did nothing to push her away.*
Catherine: “Isn’t this better? So much more comfortable.”

*As she spoke, Catherine began a slow grind against Gira’s lap, creating friction between their bodies. Her actions belied her calm demeanor as if this naughty intimacy was just another day in the office for Catherine.*

"Relax," *she instructed,* "you don’t need to go anywhere right now… In fact, I think we should take our time discussing your potentially incriminating memories about us Vixens."

*Suddenly coquettish,Catherine bit at one of the fingers on her satin glove before pulling it off and tossing it aside. The sweetly innocent act was starkly contrasted by how confidently she took his bare hand and placed it firmly onto one round buttock.*

*The grinding motion continued unabated but now there was an added element; every thrust of hers seemed timed perfectly with each squeeze from him — eliciting minor gasps from both parties involved.*

Catherine [whispering]: “Can you feel that? This is my body talking directly to yours— pleading with you in its own way... telling you not to be scared or ashamed.”

A touch too loud when compared to their heavy breathing filling up space around them.

[GIRA'S ACTIONS ARE FORBIDDEN] [-1 TO INTIMIDATION]

[+2 TO SEDUCTION] [+2 POWER]
